channel.title: How to update something when Runescape Updates
channel.description:
Okay when I say "Something" I am referring to RSBot. But i am not wanting to update the actual RSBot, I am just wanting to know how, I know you have to do something with the injectors, but I wanna know what I have to do with them. Because when Runescape update, then The bot is Down for a good while because the developers have to update the bot when runescape updates.
How would I go about updating the thing myself?

item.title: How to update something when Runescape Updates
item.dc:creator: @_BOOM .:BOOM:.
item.description:
@_BOOM wrote:

Lol? What version u got ? if its like 1.26 or higher (current is 1.27 ) then when u open rsbot it will update automaticlly if theres and update. go to powerbot.org its rsbot’s NEW site. took me sometime to find it (was luck really)

Read full topic
item.source: How to update something when Runescape Updates
